com.displayer

Class RecyclingImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • com.displayer.RecyclingImageView

  • public class RecyclingImageView
extends ImageView
    Sub-class of ImageView which automatically notifies the drawable when it is being displayed.
